name: Our Neighborhood Ouroboros
description:
A game made for the Brackeys 2021.1 Game Jam!

Following the theme of Stronger Together, you play the role of a village chief. It is your responsibility to keep a little community safe.

To do so, you must cooperate with the local patron deity, the initially unassuming Ouroboros Wyrm! This guardian is a bit of a klutz, though. 

Guide this oddball companion through its maturity as it helps defend your small village from nefarious goblins!

All controls are done through the mouse. Left click to target a destination, right click to interact with apples, bombs and more! Help the Wyrm grow to its fullest to win, and avoid defeat by protecting the village houses. Work together for the community!
